testimonials.name: Kwame Asante
testimonials.text: Papaye has been my go-to spot for authentic Ghanaian fast food. The jollof rice is absolutely divine, and the fried chicken is always crispy and flavorful!

testimonials.name: Ama Serwaa
testimonials.text: I've been coming to Papaye since I was a child. The quality has remained consistent over the years. It's not just food, it's a taste of home.

testimonials.name: John Mensah
testimonials.text: Perfect for quick business lunches. The service is fast, the food is excellent, and the atmosphere is always welcoming. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Efua Owusu
testimonials.text: Affordable prices for students and generous portions. The grilled tilapia with banku is my absolute favorite. Great value for money!

testimonials.name: Michael Adjei
testimonials.text: Visited Ghana for the first time and Papaye was recommended by locals. Now I understand why - the food is incredible! A must-visit for anyone in Accra.
